Text:
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker
The web site is flagged for hosting viruses, spyware and other malware. Any program that claims to fix dll errors is more likely to cause more problems than it fixes, and it's also likely to install bonus malware and keyloggers with the supposed improved dll files. I would only use it on my machine if you paid me several hundred dollars to do so and allowed me to run an analysis of exactly what it was doing.

Do NOT Download DLL Files to Fix Missing DLL Problems
pcsupport.about.com › ... › PC Support › Troubleshooting Guides
